member.summary: iPay sets token exp date to creation time instead of expiration time, so the token is effectively expired. iPay Tokens expire in 60 seconds. This method manually adds 60 seconds to the token exp time for expiry calculation and token validation. The token is considered expired 5 seconds before the actual expiration to compensate for any delays
